scripts.local: node beforeOfflineStart && SLS_DEBUG=* NODE_DEBUG=appsync-* sls offline start --noTimeout --reloadHandler
scripts.deploy:dev: node beforeOfflineStart && sls deploy --stage dev --region ap-southeast-1
scripts.deploy:sit: node beforeOfflineStart && sls deploy --stage sit --region ap-southeast-1
scripts.deploy:prod: node beforeOfflineStart && sls deploy --stage uat --region ap-southeast-1
scripts.deploy:uat: node beforeOfflineStart && sls deploy --stage production --region ap-southeast-1
scripts.deploy:devops: node beforeOfflineStart && sls deploy --stage devops --region ap-southeast-1
scripts.make:layer: mkdir nodejs && cp ./package.json nodejs/package.json && touch fpam-api.zip && rm fpam-api.zip
scripts.layer:zip: npm run make:layer && cd nodejs && npm install --omit=dev --ignore-scripts && cd ../ && zip -r fpam-api.zip nodejs; rm -r nodejs
